name: Pyroar
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride’s cubs.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dominating Fangs
attacks.effect: If Lysandre Labs is in play, this attack does 60 more damage.
